name: Hell's New Strategist
description:
2 levels – Don’t let the impression that the game is easy only because it has 2 levels fool you. If you lose concentration in this fast paced tower defense, it can be a certain game over.

Your are the protagonist, and the game starts after your death: You tought that after death you would finally be able to have some rest from your busy life... turns out the underworld needs your strategist abilities urgently

Game over? Game over. – This game does not have a save system, if a level is failed, the player shall start again from the beggining.

Cute ghosts – Who doensn’t like cute ghosts... everyone likes cute ghosts... right?right?

CONTROLS:

  • Left mouse Button to select, confirm and build towers
  • Right mouse Button to cancel any actions

All assets used are free and under the Creative Commons license.

Shout-out  to every creator of these amazing open source assets!

  • Audios from freesound.org:

Orangefreesounds(Retro music loop 120 bpm, Electro Groovy Synth Loop 120 bpm)
